channel.title: CVE Feed for pluginsGLPI -- sccm
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pluginsGLPI -- sccm

item.title: CVE-2021-39190|2024-08-04T01:58:18.169Z -- pluginsglpi -- sccm
item.description: The SCCM plugin for GLPI is a plugin to synchronize computers from SCCM (version 1802) to GLPI. In versions prior to 2.3.0, the Configuration page is publicly accessible in read-only mode. This issue is patched in version 2.3.0. No known workarounds exist.
